    • Method Detail

      • revenueOfAFixedPeriod

        private static double revenueOfAFixedPeriod(java.time.LocalDate dateFrom,
                                            java.time.LocalDate dateTo,
                                            Hotel hotel)
        Calculates the revenue of the specified hotel for a specified, fixed period of time. The revenue is calculated by getting the total cost of each stay in the hotel and adding them together.
        Parameters:
        dateFrom - the specified start date for the analysis
        dateTo - the specified end date for the analysis
        hotel - the hotel that you are running the data analysis on
        Returns:
        revenue

      • numberOfRoomsOccupied

        private static int numberOfRoomsOccupied(java.time.LocalDate dateFrom,
                                         java.time.LocalDate dateTo,
                                         Hotel hotel)
        Calculates the number of rooms occupied in the specified hotel over the specified period of time.
        Parameters:
        dateFrom - the specified start date for the analysis
        dateTo - the specified end date for the analysis
        hotel - the hotel you want to do the analysis on
        Returns:
        number of rooms occupied

      • mostCommonRoomType

        private static Room mostCommonRoomType(java.time.LocalDate dateFrom,
                                       java.time.LocalDate dateTo,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Room> RoomTypes,
                                       Hotel hotel)
        Returns the most commonly booked room in the specified hotel over the specified period of time.
        Parameters:
        dateFrom - the specified start date for the analysis
        dateTo - the specified end date for the analysis
        RoomTypes - the different types of room in each hotel
        hotel - the hotel specified for analysis
        Returns:
        most common type of room

      • writeDataAnalyticsToCSV

        public static void writeDataAnalyticsToCSV(java.time.LocalDate from,
                                           java.time.LocalDate to,
                                           Hotel hotel)
        Writes the data analysis to a CSV file, which includes revenue over a fixed period, the most common room type and the number of rooms occupied.
        Parameters:
        from - the specified start date for the analysis
        to - the specified end date for the analysis
        hotel - the hotel specified for analysis
